participant_2.background:
My weight is not relevant to my job or my training as a welder.

My sweet tooth loves gummy worms.
i listen to techno music , exclusively.
I want to have more fun with my siblings.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing ok! I just had knee surgery yesterday so my left leg is pretty sore.
Oh no, that sounds really painful! I hope you feel better soon.
Thanks! It's a bit better today but I'm still pretty slow.
I'm sorry to hear that. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to listen to techno music and dance. I also like to play video games.
Oh cool! I love to dance too. What's your favorite type of music to dance to?
I love all types of music but techno is my favorite. It's so upbeat and energetic.
I know what you mean! I love dancing to techno music too. It gets me so pumped up.
Me too! It's the best way to get rid of stress.
I totally agree! I'm glad you're feeling better. I hope you have a speedy recovery.
